channel.title: Andy Warhol on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Andy Warhol on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Let's Talk Toner
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: In an era where paper is becoming less important than ever, it feels a bit bizarre at this point to go back in time just 35 years ago, when paper was perhaps having its greatest moment of all time. We were just a few years from the desktop publishing revolution, which expanded the sheer amount of stuff one could put on a page. The ‘zine movement was perhaps at its peak during this time, proving an important way to democratize content for the average person.
